selected_quotes: Confidence ratings are subject to heuristics and are not Bayes-optimal. Precisely what we've argued too
WEI JI MA SAYS SUBJECTS TAKE UNCERTAINTY INTO ACCOUNT OF THEIR DECISIONS BUT NOT IN A BAYESIAN MANNER. fyi
Heuristic probabilistic models provide the best fit to human confidence ratings: Not Bayesian due to implementation?
@SwiftOnSecurity was going to say you've got a great Bayesian filter, but remembered this
So important to distinguish probabilistic (using uncertainty) from Bayesian (using uncertainty optimally) computation

citation.title: The computations underlying human confidence reports are probabilistic, but not Bayesian
